timelogger

Class WorkMonth

  • java.lang.Object
    • timelogger.WorkMonth

  • public class WorkMonth
extends java.lang.Object
    With the instantiation of this class we can create work months. We can ask for the days in this month and we can change it. We can ask for the sum of the working minutes in this work month, and the extra minutes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorkMonth() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addWorkDay(WorkDay workDay)
      This method is an overloaded method of addWorkDay(WorkDay,boolean) with the default false value: addWorkDay(WorkDay,false)
      void addWorkDay(WorkDay workDay, boolean isWeekendEnabled)
      This method adds a work day to this month, if the work day is a weekday.
      long getExtraMinPerMonth()
      This method calculates all the extra worked minutes in this month
      long getSumPerMonth()
      This method calculates all the minutes in this month while the employee worked

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorkMonth

        public WorkMonth()

    • Method Detail

      • getSumPerMonth

        public long getSumPerMonth()
        This method calculates all the minutes in this month while the employee worked
        Returns:
        with a positive value of worked minutes

      • getExtraMinPerMonth

        public long getExtraMinPerMonth()
        This method calculates all the extra worked minutes in this month
        Returns:
        with the signed value of extra minutes. If it is positive the employee worked more, if it is negative the employee worked less, then the required.

      • addWorkDay

        public void addWorkDay(WorkDay workDay)
        This method is an overloaded method of addWorkDay(WorkDay,boolean) with the default false value: addWorkDay(WorkDay,false)
        Parameters:
        workDay - This is a WorkDay parameter, which will be added.

      • addWorkDay

        public void addWorkDay(WorkDay workDay,
                       boolean isWeekendEnabled)
        This method adds a work day to this month, if the work day is a weekday. But if it is on weekend we have to enable to work on weekend.
        Parameters:
        workDay - This is a WorkDay parameter, which will be added.
        isWeekendEnabled - This is a boolean parameter, if it is false, we cannot work on weekend, but if it is true, we can add a day of weekend to this month.
